text: Tāya bhikkhuniyā so patto bhikkhuniparisāya nissajjitabbo yo ca tassā bhikkhuniparisāya pattapariyanto so tassā bhikkhuniyā padātabbo ayaṃ te bhikkhuni patto yāvabhedanāya dhāretabbo ti ayaṃ tattha sāmīci
edit: Tāya bhikkhuniyā so patto bhikkhuniparisāya nissajjitabbo yo ca tassā bhikkhuniparisāya pattapariyanto so tassā bhikkhuniyā padātabbo ayaṃ te bhikkhuni patto yāvabhedanāya dhāretabbo ti ayaṃ tattha sāmīci

translations.transtext: The bowl is to be forfeited by the bhikkhunī to the company of bhikkhunīs. That company of bhikkhunīs' final bowl should be presented to the bhikkhunī, (saying,) "This, bhikkhunī, is your bowl. It is to be kept until broken." This is the proper course here.
